name: The Lightkeeper
description:
The Lightkeeper is a small action-adventure game inspired by Metroid.

As the new lightkeeper, you set out to investigate strange noises coming from the basement of your house. The story (told through item descriptions and environmental clues) has a Lovecraft vibe, as you discover the cosmic horrors that lies beneath the lighthouse.

The game is complete, with 2 to 3 hours of gameplay. You can explore six major areas, fight a dozen enemies (including four unique bosses), and discover many powerups and keys to gradually unlock the world map.

However, it's still a bit rough around the edges. Many "quality-of-life" features are missing, and the sound design is a bit crude. I plan to continue working on the game in the following months. Right now, you can think of it as an "early access release".

Still, I hope you will enjoy it. Let me know in the comments!
